HomePage.title: LiftingDiary
HomePage.heroSubtitle: The simplest way to track your workouts, monitor your progress, and reach your fitness goals. consistent tracking is the key to progress.
HomePage.featureCalendarDescription: Visualize your consistency. See your workout history at a glance and plan your week ahead.
HomePage.featureLoggingDescription: Quick and intuitive data entry. Spend less time on your phone and more time lifting.
HomePage.featureProgressDescription: Watch your numbers go up. Track your personal records and volume over time.
